attributes.action: Make mother a child spaces have display badges.
attributes.additional_details: I want mother and child spaces to be like disabled spaces and have badges to display you have a child of a certain age. Ie up untill they aren't in a car seat and pram.
attributes.background: On 10 occasions I've had to leave my baby in the car park whilst I reverse my car to be able to fit her in the door,Whilst I watch so many people use the mother and child spaces when they have no children. Or they are being used for parents with 14 to 16 yearold teenagers that aren't in a car seat.

rejection.details:
Parent and child parking bays are put in place by the company that operate a car park, and it is therefore not illegal to incorrectly use a parking bay, although the company that operates the car park could choose to fine someone incorrectly using a parking space.

You could contact the company operating the car park you have concerns about, and raise the matter directly with them.
